compatibility.notes: The BSD-3-Clause-flex license is permissive and allows for integration with various other licenses, provided that the terms of the original license are maintained.

key_requirements: Maintain the copyright notice and list of conditions in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Provide a copy of the license with any binary distribution.
license.name: BSD-3-Clause-flex
obligations: Retain the copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Include the copyright notice and disclaimer in redistributions in binary form.
Obtain specific prior written permission to use the names of the University or contributors for endorsement or promotion.
